story.text: The Hermes-Lite is an outstanding low-cost direct down/up conversion software defined amateur radio HF transceiver based on a broadband modem chip and the Hermes SDR project. [https://www.sdr-radio.com/hermes-lite-2-hl2 post] [http://www.hermeslite.com/ site]  [https://github.com/softerhardware/Hermes-Lite2/wiki wiki] [https://lirp-cdn.multiscreensite.com/46d0be53/dms3rep/multi/opt/IMG_3072-1920w.JPG enlarge]
